title: "brevard"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r libraries}
library(leaflet)
measurements <- read.csv("map_brevard2.csv")
summary(measurements)
```

```{r map}
data(measurements)

leaflet(measurements[1:305,]) %>% addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~long, ~lat,)
```

```{r map}
wellIcon <- icons(
  iconUrl = ifelse(measurements$Type == "Oil Well",
    "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/dc/Oil_well_icon.svg",
    "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/79/Water_Drop_Icon_Vector.png"
  ),
  iconWidth = 18, iconHeight = 28,
  iconAnchorX = 22, iconAnchorY = 94,
)

leaflet(data = measurements) %>% addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~long, ~lat, icon = wellIcon)
```
